LanguageData.AwkwardExecution.stages.awkward_executio: That execution was awkward. The incompetence on display made the whole thing feel unjustified.
LanguageData.BeautifulSkyLanterns.stages.beautiful_sk: I felt at peace as the lanterns drifted off.
LanguageData.BoringBlinding.stages.boring_blinding.de: That blinding lacked passion and the technique wasn't great.
LanguageData.BoringDuel.stages.boring_duel.label: boring duel
LanguageData.BoringDuel.stages.boring_duel.descriptio: That duel was awkward. No aggressive energy, just attempts to survive.
LanguageData.BoringFestival.stages.boring_festival.de: That festival was awkward. I wish I could have left.
LanguageData.BoringParty.stages.boring_party.label: boring party
LanguageData.BoringParty.stages.boring_party.descript: That party was not good. Uninteresting music, poor dancing. Wish I never went.
That sacrifice lacked passion and the technique wasn't great.
LanguageData.BoringScarification.stages.boring_scarif: That scarification lacked passion and the technique wasn't great.
LanguageData.EffectiveConversion.stages.effective_con: That conversion ritual went well. The speech was stirring and enjoyable to listen to.
LanguageData.FunFestival.stages.fun_festival.label: fun festival
LanguageData.FunFestival.stages.fun_festival.descript: I had fun! We got to hang out and relax.
LanguageData.FunParty.stages.fun_party.label: fun party
LanguageData.FunParty.stages.fun_party.description: That was a fun party. A good break from daily life.
LanguageData.GoodDuel.stages.good_duel.label: good duel
LanguageData.GoodDuel.stages.good_duel.description: That duel was good. The fighters really showed heart.
LanguageData.GoodFuneral.stages.good_funeral.label: good funeral
LanguageData.GoodFuneral.stages.good_funeral.descript: That funeral went well - a good way to say goodbye.
LanguageData.HeartwarmingFuneral.stages.heartwarming_: That funeral went perfectly - it brought up a lot of good memories and showed us a path forward.
LanguageData.LacklusterFuneral.stages.lackluster_fune: That funeral was really uninspired and didn't resolve anything.
LanguageData.MasterfulConversion.stages.masterful_con: Masterful! Old beliefs were left in tatters, and our true knowledge was accepted without a shadow of a doubt.
LanguageData.SatisfyingBlinding.stages.satisfying_bli: That blinding was satisfying. The cut was deep and made a satisfying wet-sucking noise.
LanguageData.SatisfyingExecution.stages.satisfying_ex: That execution was satisfying. It felt like justice was served.
LanguageData.SatisfyingSacrifice.stages.satisfying_sa: That sacrifice was satisfying - well-executed and appropriately bloody.
LanguageData.SatisfyingScarification.stages.satisfyin: That scarification was satisfying - cleanly-traced and appropriately painful-looking.
LanguageData.SpectacularBlinding.stages.spectacular_b: The intoned voices, the terrible and amazing blade, the painful shivering and cutting - That blinding ceremony was sublime!
LanguageData.SpectacularExecution.stages.spectacular_: That execution was electrifying! Never have I felt such a sensation of justice being served.
LanguageData.SpectacularSacrifice.stages.spectacular_: The blood! The release! That sacrifice made me feel like we were connecting with another world.
LanguageData.SpectacularScarification.stages.spectacu: The flesh curled and shapes like magic under the knife. It was a true transformation through suffering!
LanguageData.TerribleBlinding.stages.terrible_blindin: That blinding was botched and the mood was way off. What an awkward ceremony.
LanguageData.TerribleDuel.stages.terrible_duel.label: terrible duel
LanguageData.TerribleDuel.stages.terrible_duel.descri: That duel was horrible. I'm still cringing thinking about the bumbling cowardice.
LanguageData.TerribleFestival.stages.terrible_festiva: That festival was horrible. I'm still cringing from the awkwardness flashbacks.
LanguageData.TerribleFuneral.stages.disgraceful_funer: That funeral was borderline insulting to everyone involved.
LanguageData.TerribleParty.stages.terrible_party.desc: That party was terrible. Bad music, awkward dancing... ugh.
LanguageData.TerribleSacrifice.stages.terrible_sacrif: That sacrifice was botched and the mood was way off. What an awful, awkward death.
LanguageData.TerribleScarification.stages.terrible_sc: The scarification was botched and the mood was way off. What an awkward ceremony.
LanguageData.TerribleSkyLanterns.stages.terrible_skyl: I hated having to make that skylantern, and they looked like garbage anyway.
LanguageData.UnforgettableDuel.stages.unforgettable_d: The courage... the blood... the death... I could never forget that.
LanguageData.UnforgettableFestival.stages.unforgettab: That festival was something I'll never forget.
LanguageData.UnforgettableParty.stages.unforgettable_: That party was awesome! The music, the mood... Everything was perfect.
LanguageData.UnforgettableSkyLanterns.stages.unforget: The sense of togetherness during construction, the moment of release - it was like my troubles drifted away with those skylanterns.
LanguageData.UnimpressiveSkyLanterns.stages.boring_sk: Those skylanterns didn't impress me. Just a waste of time and resources.
